short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Swapping authors name with the titles, as people often dont look at the authors.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Give credit swaps the authors name with their article titles on the NYTimes website. Why? Because too often people read countless articles without ever noting who wrote it. It's important to Give Credit to journalists who inform us on daily issues that impact our lives, hopefully this extension will encourage that.
